TopicTitle: Why aren't any of my posts/threads being accepted

Articles.Content:
look.. I know devs/mods have to read every post then approve it, but what is it, something I said that broke a rule? A rule for that matter that I couldn't read because it was in white font over white background when I went through the rules posts ?

Look, many posts of mine are in some queue, probably being skipped over for posts newer in the queue.

If you manage to read this post and are not a dev/mod this sounds perfectly rediculas.... But please whoever you are reading this off before its approved, just look for my other posts, accept them and then il be perfectly fine with this one being deleted.

Thankyou...

Whoops sorry, sometimes we forget to check the queue

You're over 3 posts now so won't have to worry about auto-moderation, it's just an anti-spambot thing
